overview: From 2024-12-29 to 2025-01-05, elizaos/eliza had 189 new PRs (87 merged), 91 new issues, and 207 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Update .env.example
completedItems.body: Grok / xAI API Key are the same. Same endpoint. It's confusing to split it into Grok and xAI separately. If someone wants to use Grok, they will enter their xAI API key at the GROK_API_KEY, and it works.

completedItems.title: fix(client): improve Windows compatibility for Vite dev server
completedItems.body:
# Localhost Handling: Windows vs macOS

## Windows Behavior
1. Network Stack
- Defaults to IPv6 (::1) when resolving `localhost`
- More strict separation between localhost and IP address bindings
- Requires explicit permissions fo

completedItems.title: fix: smoke tests
feat: Plugin sui support for suiprivatekey0x account
completedItems.body:
When use plugin-sui support `suiprivatekey` account.

Add .env: 

```shell
SUI_PRIVATE_KEY: suiprivkey1qzuw2uvhqz330pwl94rv39jvk93kuvfd4pvdkw9vl922kum80prqvxtlntr
```

Then use `plugin-sui` as before.
